structure.unit: ARTICLE XV. DISCRETIONARY SALES SURTAX AUTHORIZED BY SECTION 212.055(1), FLORIDA STATUTES (1999).

text.section:
Sec. 29-120. Value analysis.
Value analysis, as provided in items (a) through (g) of Subsection (11) of of the Code, shall be incorporated into the establishment of proposed transit routes, their feasibility, and all capital improvements made pursuant to this article.
